title: Ensure that symlink support works nicely unelevated on Creators Update
body: According to https://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2016/12/02/symlinks-windows-10 symlinks will no longer require elevation on Windows builds after 14972. We should make sure that MSBuild's symlink support plays nicely in that environment.

nodes.body: Just ran into this one when searching for symlink-related issues. Looks like it should be ok to close. cc @rainersigwald
